title: New Jinx Skin on PBE (Firecracker!)
body: The new Jinx skin that was just released on PBE looks AMAZING! Along with Katarina, Nidalee and Vel'koz... This is an amazing batch of skins... Well played Riot, well played.

replies.body: I love the Jinx skin but the Green hair looks out of place. I would rather her hair be one solid color, or something that matches a bit more.

> [{quoted}](name=Silentcoyote,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Ahe3Aytl,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-01-14T01:48:26.804+0000)
>
> I love the Jinx skin but the Green hair looks out of place. I would rather her hair be one solid color, or something that matches a bit more.

I agree it throws me off too but hey Jinx is crazy so.

I also wish it was normal color or maybe to match the red in her outfit. That or make her hair all green lmao. I don't mind that either.
Well, there's still time to recolor hair if people complain enough lol

Love the Nid and Jinx new skin. Don't think I like the new kat skin as much.
Definitely going to get the Jinx skin when it comes (already spent some money for RP with the bonus)

velkoz looks sweet too. and Braum gives me a laugh
Yea. Kat's skins never have much of anything new on them. It's kind of disappointing. She needs better visual effects with new skins.

It's all about the hair bruh. I don't think a lot of people are complaining about it though. Just a few.


Like me lol

Haha.. The hair doesn't bother me really. She's crazy....so she makes no sense haha... I wouldn't mind it matching the clothes a little better, but it still matches the festive colors of that type of thing.
I'm extremely tempted to buy Jinx and learn her just for that skin. Specifically those explosions... it's like Wind Waker. I'm in awe.
She's one of my top ADCs anyway and one of the strongest besides Graves atm.. She is really fun.. You should give it a go :)
Yeah her bazooka and passive are what interest me most
I vote FrostBlade Yasuo later down the line {{champion:157}}
only if his ass is as amazing as irelias is in her splash
Bahaha!!
I don't play Yasuo or even own him, but that does sound pretty intriguing.
Right??? Now that would be a(n) interesting skin even if people don't really play him like that!
And yet somehow people are complaining about it.
I haven't seen any complaints yet, minus the nitpicking hair comment lol
I personally am not a fan of Nidalee's hair, but I still like it more than I hate it.
VEL'KOZ HAS SEEN THE LIGHT! AND NOW ABUSES IT'S POWERS!
Glad you like them! :D

They are AMAZING. I love Vel'Koz and I play him as support quite often. I don't think people give him enough credit. His particle effects for his abilities with this new skin are unreal. His W is phenomenal. Great job! GG Bank account.

Could you send me a link to the new skins I haven't seen them yet 
:(
I replied to your previous comment with the link :)

thank you 
THAT VEL'KOZ SKIN IS AMAZING
OMG I HAVE TO GET IT
Its okay, its not the same quality as Battlecast IMO. It's also not Spaghetti monster Vel'koz, which I would drop 3250 rp on btw.

Great job on them riot! And would you mind looking at my new skin idea  heres the link : http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/trbKBaTi-midnight-shinobi-sivir and tell me if u like it plz  /.\

I actually looked at that on forums and quite like it. However, a new splash art was put in a hidden spot on the PBE and it's a splash art for what looks like Sivir and Nautilus and it looks reallllly cool... But Sivir is in full armor... Soooooo idk
Its a  shinobi skinnn  for her ! All the hard work T_T and description in detail how i wanted her to look

Katey, I'm already planning to throw money at you people for this amazing Jinx skin.

Like it is an understatement.

*I love it so much I'm fanboying so hard*
It's a good thing I preemptively got some more RP, because Arbiter Vel'koz and Firecracker Jinx look amazing. There goes my money right away.
Mine too.. I have 3000 RP atm.. But I'll need more because I'm also buying Challenger Ahri (wish it was still Dauntless though)

I love the look of jinx and the firecracker sounds, but I think my absolute favourite part is the way the smoke is. I love the more cartoonish style rather than working for more realistic smoke. So awesome.

I haven't seen them 
could you give me a link to the new skins

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/01/113-pbe-update.html#more  I don't know if I'm allowed to link that, but I assume Riot will delete it if not. That's the popular website that supplies all the PBE updates when they happen.
I also love the Vel skin.. Did you watch the video for him? That W is amazing.
I love Warring Kingdoms Nidalee and the Firecracker Jinx! :D
YES! They all look great, but I'll definitely be buying Firecracker Jinx and Arbiter Vel'koz.

> [{quoted}](name=Conderoi,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Ahe3Aytl,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-13T22:29:59.244+0000)
>
> I love Warring Kingdoms Nidalee and the Firecracker Jinx! :D

You mean warring kingdoms kat?
There's a Warring Kingdoms Nidalee also
But when does it come out

Bot lane is going to be full of fire crackers

{{champion:222}}
I will be one of them! But Jinx and Lucian are the only ADCs I play. Although I recently picked up Varus. I really like him
they all look good, i love the spell effects on jinx. Great job Riot :)
The new Jinx skin...
Haha yes!
HOT DAMN THAT JINX SKIN LOOKS SO GOOD.
Warring Kingdoms Katarina, Warring Kingdoms Nidalee and Arbiter Vel'Koz are also in the update. They all look amazing.
